meanings.definition: Connect or link with each other.
meanings.sent1: The roads interconnect in the city center.
meanings.sent2: The internet interconnects people from all around the world.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces interconnect perfectly, creating a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: The characters' storylines interconnect in a surprising twist.
meanings.sent5: The veins interconnect throughout the body, ensuring proper blood flow.

meanings.sent1: The interconnects of the computer allow data to flow smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The interconnects of the train tracks keep the trains running on time.
meanings.sent3: The interconnects of the toy train set make it fun to play with.
meanings.sent4: The interconnects of the ecosystem are delicate and crucial for balance.
meanings.sent5: The interconnects of the plumbing system ensure water reaches every faucet.
